title: L&T Finance ready to put Rs 10 lakh in PM Fund to avoid contempt charges - Economic Times
content: L&T Finance ready to put Rs 10 lakh in PM Fund to avoid contempt charges  Economic Times
description: Accepting the apology, the Delhi High Court last week observed "even if there is no wilful disobedience, yet, carelessness or negligence can also amount to contempt of court".
